item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Captain Seaweed's - on the East Side of Providence on Ives St. 3 blocks north of Wickenden.

As you may recall, we were just here last month for one of the largest Monday Night Meetups on record.  And since it's not the usual Collective style to do a repeat so soon, you may be wondering why we're headed back.  The answer:  FREE FOOD!  The management at Captain Seaweed's was so happy about the turnout last time, and had such a great time hanging out with us, that they'd like to throw a cookout party in our honor.

Drinks will still be their usual low prices, but the burgers, hot dogs, and sides will be on the house.

**Please be sure to RSVP by 9am on the 26th**  We need to give an accurate head count to the bar's management so they know how many people they are feeding.

Remember, they don't take plastic, so bring a fist full of dollars.

It's free food for everyone, so let's check it out! 

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Other than a handful of the bar's regulars, we'll be taking up most of the place. If the weather is nice we'll be outside again, on their fantastic patio.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Captain Seaweed's Cookout
